summary: The document pertains to the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992, featuring a communication from AMCORZ-2 to his Case Officer regarding a document from Agent 1995, Modesto VENTOSO. This document contains a sketch of a defensive setup for a battalion, with specific company placements, and was postmarked on 15 April 1963, delivered on 16 August 1963.
key_findings: The document is among those disclosed under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It includes a military sketch for a battalion's defensive position, hinting at military or intelligence operations near the time of Kennedy's assassination.
The roles of AMCORZ-2 and Agent 1995 (Modesto VENTOSO) imply covert operations or intelligence activities.
keywords: President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992
